typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		result as (Amount as string, COMPANY as string, CONCESSION_Code as string, CONCESSION_Description as string, CONCESSION_ID as integer, CST as string, Compartment as string, Concession as string, Percent_Reduce as double, Price as string, Price_Reduced as string, Quantity as short, SALE_TYPE as string, Shop_Code as string, Shop_Name as string, SubCompartment as string, TAXES1 as double, TAXES2 as double, TAX_SLAB as double, TRANSDATE as long, TRANSNUM as short, TRANSTIME as integer, TRANSTIMESTR as integer, TYPE as string, Unit_Price as string, emp_Name as string, emp_code as string, nick_name as string, prod_code as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(result),
	mapColumn(
		result
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 derive(Shop_Code = result.Shop_Code,
		Shop_Name = result.Shop_Name,
		COMPANY = result.COMPANY,
		Compartment = result.Compartment,
		SubCompartment = result.SubCompartment,
		TYPE = result.TYPE,
		nick_name = result.nick_name,
		prod_code = result.prod_code,
		NetSold_Qty = result.NetSold_Qty,
		Cost = result.Cost,
		Price = result.Price,
		Unit_Price = result.Unit_Price,
		PriceOverride = 0,
		CONCESSION_ID = result.CONCESSION_ID,
		CONCESSION_Code = result.CONCESSION_Code,
		Price_Reduced = result.Price_Reduced,
		CONCESSION_Description = result.CONCESSION_Description,
		Concession = result.Concession,
		Percent_Reduce = result.Percent_Reduce,
		Amount = result.Amount,
		TAX_SLAB = result.TAX_SLAB,
		TAXES1 = result.TAXES1,
		TAXES2 = result.TAXES2,
		emp_code = result.emp_Name,
		Emp_Name = result.emp_Name,
		TRANSDATE = result.TRANSDATE,
		TRANSTIME = result.TRANSTIME,
		TRANSNUM = result.TRANSNUM) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		json_value as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Store_Code = Shop_Code,
		Store_Name = Shop_Name,
		COMPANY,
		Compartment,
		SubCompartment,
		TYPE,
		nick_name,
		prod_code,
		NetSold_Qty,
		Cost,
		Retail_Price = Price,
		Unit_Price_Sold = Unit_Price,
		FinalPrice = PriceOverride,
		CONCESSION_ID,
		CONCESSION_Code,
		New_Price_After_Discount = Price_Reduced,
		CONCESSION_Description,
		Amount_Discount = Concession,
		Percent_Discount = Percent_Reduce,
		NetSold_Amount = Amount,
		TAX_RATE = TAX_SLAB,
		TAX_AMOUNT1 = TAXES1,
		TAX_AMOUNT2 = TAXES2,
		emp_code,
		Emp_Name,
		TRANSDATE,
		TRANSTIME,
		TRANSNUM
	)) ~> sink1
